page.title: 14CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content:
The area is rich in clubs of all kinds and there is a wide choice of activity
{Larne Drama Circle}stages plays in the Victoria Hall and is host for annual Drama Festivals. In 1985 the Circle won the top award at the Ulster finals
{Larne Camera Club}is based in the Arts Centre and has darkroom facilities.
{Larne Historical Society} has a season of lectures over the winter months. {Larne Folklore Society}keeps alive old traditions and has staged Hiring Fairs
{Larne Choral Society}produces musicals and performs serious choral works.
{Irish Dancing}has several groups while all sporting activities are available.
